entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 27. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 16 May 2016
